name: Air Fryer Sausage Patties
author: Yoly
summary: Air fry your sausage patties and you will avoid grease splatter all over your stovetop. Best part is, the patties will be nicely browned.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package sausage patties (such as Johnsonville®)
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place sausage patties into the basket in 1 layer, working in batches if necessary
Cook in the preheated air fryer for 5 minutes
Pull the basket out, turn sausage over, and cook until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of a patty reads 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 3 minutes more
